column4: hi there.. i lost my graphical surface! and "startx" doesn't work.. doesn't find the command
then something's messed up in your config.
don't give up though; there are others here who could probably help.
no, breezy too, but you shouldn't be using it. :P
that would explain your problems!  i had them last weekend and had to reinstall hoary. :P
but i kinda gave up after a certain point.  maybe you'll have better luck. :)
if you don't know what you're doing or what things mean, you *definitely* should not be on breezy. :)
then ubuntu probably isn't the best distro for you.
don't take my word that that's necessary, but it is probably quicker. :P
